item.title: Guideschi You Guys
item.description:
"You Guys!" was an insult. But this expression was transformed into a term of endearment, in America, by the working class. Because that is what the working class do.

Gunpowder Plot

You are probably familiar with the Gunpowder Plot, in which Guy Fawkes, attempted to blow up Parliament on 5 …

item.title: Lohengrin
item.description:
Have you heard of Lohengrin? It is a German Opera written and composed by Richard Wagner in 1850. I happen to think that German Opera is more entertaining than Italian Opera, but enough about me.

King Ludwig II

Which brings me to King Ludwig II of Bavaria. If I understand …
item.dc:creator: Trent Palmer

item.title: Battle In The Middle Ages
item.description:
There were three type of battles in Europe in the Middle Ages:

  1. Raids
  2. Sieges
  3. Field-Battles

There were two types of soldiers in Europe in the Middle Ages:

  1. cavalry
  2. and infantry.

Raids

Infantry tended to not be used in raids, because horses had the advantage in speed and mobility.

Sieges

Cavalry …
